title: I judge people absed on what skin they're using.
body:
Common with Vayne.

**No Skin**: New and has no mechanics.
**Vindicator**: Will go hard past 20 mins.
**Aristocrat**: Will struggle but somehow ends up carrying the match.
**Dragonslayer**: Garbage, Gosu wannabe dives 1v5 and dies.
**Heartseeker**: Spends more time talking than playing.
**SKT T1**: LOL GTFO garbage.
**Arclight**: Spends more time pressing B and pretending to be an angel instead of pinning dark people up against the wall.

replies.body: Wow great system you have there OP

No skin: New to Rengar, doesn't know how to play him.
Nighthunter: Barely average or trash.
SSW Rengar: Why do you even exist.
Headhunter: You have the potential to be a god.

I don't judge, but this is what i've seen ever since Rengar was released.

I judge people by the threads they create.

You don't rate very highly.

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AO4i4Wwl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-02T10:41:15.071+0000)
>
> I judge people by the threads they create.
> 
> You don't rate very highly.

\<genereic response to bronze lord>/

No Skin: New; doesn't know how to play.
Deep Terror Thresh: Doesn't know how to play.
Blood Moon Thresh: Hype; doesn't know how to play.
SSW Thresh: Hype; doesn't know how to play.

Dragonslayer: Garbage, Gosu wannabe dives 1v5 and dies.

SKT T1: LOL GTFO garbage.

Lol f-ck you i'm so bad at Vayne but I bought these skins for the 1 in 10 games I go 20-0.
